overview: Today when most students are equipped with technological devices, our teachers still continue to struggle and teach themselves, to unlearn the older ways of teaching, to learn to use technology they are completely unfamiliar with, and relearn their passion for teaching, even in the face of these difficulties, so that learning never stops.  This short film is a tribute to celebrate their spirit to  Learn Unlearn Relearn  Here's to all the teachers who keep the world moving and growing everyday, who teach us to Keep Learning everyday.
title: Happy Teacher's Day
